title: Remarkables Final Day
content:
Last day on the snow! We had one day left for the remarkables, so went there for a very chill final day. The vibe was the most lax Iâ€™ve experienced on the snow. Pretty much bluebird, somewhat quiet, decent snow, warmish day. It was a real nice relaxed way to spend the final day!

Kris even made it up the top of the Sugar bowl chair for this one! Progress all round :)

Last night dinner was Lone Star! Had a great waiter for the night - very relaxed and fun guy, and the food was great too!
